name: KELLOGG'S* RICE KRISPIES* Savoury Sweet Potato Sticks
author: Anonymous
summary: Spicy sweet potato sticks with a crunchy coating make a surefire kid-pleasing snack.
ingredients: 3 cups KELLOGG'S* RICE KRISPIES* cereal, crushed
directions: Wash sweet potatoes (or peel if desired)
In large plate or shallow pan, mix together crushed cereal and seasonings
In medium bowl, beat egg whites and water
Coat potatoes with flour, shaking off excess
Next dip in egg mixture, then coat with cereal mixture
Place in single layer on foil-lined baking sheet coated with cooking spray
Bake at 200 degrees C (400 degrees F) about 25 minutes or until lightly browned and tender when tested with sharp knife
Serve hot with salsa or roasted garlic mayonnaise if desired
